channel.title: Help with the server
channel.description:
i've downloaded a server and a client, what is the next step i need to do ??
im sorry for posting this but i've read almost all the guides and followed them exactly but when i click on run it stuck on the loading screen on connecting to update server.
please tell me if i've done something wrong, or at least give me some tips on how to set the server/client up.
btw i have 508.
thank you very much in advance
